item.title: "If You Have a Ten Year Plan, What's Stopping You From Doing it in two?"
item.description: “If You Have a Ten Year Plan, What’s Stopping You From Doing it in two?” References (References:: Simon Sarris)

item.title: Raise Your Ambitions, Lower Your Expectations
item.description: Raise Your Ambitions, Lower Your Expectations “Raise your ambitions. Lower your expectations. The higher your ambitions, the bolder your actions.

item.title: Striving
item.description: Striving The desire to work and do better that [[Keynes]] argues is conditioned in us and can gradually disappear as [[Automation]] reduces the need to [[Work]]
